import React, {useRef, useState} from 'react' import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import {BsFacebook, BsTwitter, BsLinkedin} from "react-icons/bs"; import {useAuth} from "./contexts/AuthContext"; function Signup() { const emailRef = useRef() const passwordRef = useRef() const passwordConfirmRef = useRef() const {signup} = useAuth(); const [error, setError] = useState(''); function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() if (passwordRef.current.value !== passwordConfirmRef.current.value) { } signup(emailRef.current.value, passwordRef.current.value) } return (
Sign up with
Or
Sign up
) } export default Signup
